Description: Fragment of thick, weft-faced plain weave, woollen cloth, mainly undyed/cream, with banded decoration; Narrow maroon band follows the starting border; Further along is a multiple band - from centre out (symmetrical): 1.5cm mid brown (48 picks), 4 picks light green, 3 dark blue, 4 cream, 1.3-1.5cm maroon (45+48), 3+4 cream, 3 dark blue; Warp: S spun undyed wool, c.8tpc; Weft: S spun c.28tpc in plain areas and c.28-36tpc in band; Edges: double cord, twsited started border, other edges cut
Curator's comments: Unreg. 68; Similar to EA72448; Edges cut post excavation; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (9.4.1991)
